content: Family Bank Account General Asked by Zheng De LeeAsked on 20 Oct 2018What do you think about getting the NS SAFRA Debit card (For those who already had done so or haven't) - Thoughts if it's worth to sign up for?NS SAFRA Debit Card1 answerAnswerBump1
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Gabriel LeeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 20 Oct 2018Firstly, you have spend a minimum of $400 every month in order to get cash rebates from your purchases/transactions. Secondly, even if you spend at least $400 a month, the cash rebates are in the form of SAFRA$ and can only be used at the various SAFRA clubs. So if you don't visit SAFRA very often or are not a SAFRA member, I don't think it's worth it.0 comments0
